channel.title: The Spark with Tift Merritt
channel.itunes:subtitle: Grammy-nominated songwriter Tift Merritt interviews her favorite writers, painters, musicians about their craft
channel.itunes:author: Tift Merritt
channel.itunes:summary: Meet the real people behind great works of art with Grammy nominated songwriter Tift Merritt.
channel.description: The Spark is a monthly interview program hosted by Grammy-nominated songwriter Tift Merritt. Each month she interviews a different artist about how they ply their trade and make their way between art and real life.

item.title: Interview with author Nick Hornby
item.itunes:author: Tift Merritt
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with author Nick Hornby
item.itunes:summary: This month Tift Merritt interviews author Nick Hornby.
item.itunes:keywords: tift, merritt, nick, hornby, spark, merritt
